task_description:
# Thread Builder

Add a dedicated thread creation interface where users can compose multi-tweet threads with individual scoring for each tweet and overall thread scoring.

## Rationale
Threads are a key content format on X. Typefully excels at threads but lacks scoring. Punchline X can combine both strengths.

## User Stories
- As a creator, I want to build threads so that I can share longer-form content
- As a thread writer, I want individual tweet scores so that I can optimize each part
- As a user, I want thread structure suggestions so that my threads flow well

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Users can create threads with 2-25 tweets
- [ ] Each tweet in thread has individual score
- [ ] Overall thread score and flow analysis
- [ ] Suggestions for thread structure and pacing
- [ ] Easy reordering with drag-and-drop
